Class Shelf

java.lang.Object
fr.uge.cascadia.board.Shelf
public class Shelf extends Object
The Shelf class represents a storage system for tiles and animal tokens. Each tile and token is assigned a unique ID for tracking. The shelf uses two maps: - `tileMap`: Stores tiles associated with their unique IDs. - `tokenMap`: Stores animal tokens associated with their unique IDs. This class provides methods to add, retrieve, and manage tiles and tokens.
Author:
Massinissa

  • Method Details

    • size

      public int size()
      getter of the size of the shelf
      Returns:
      size of the shelf type int

    • makeShelf

      public void makeShelf(List<Tile> bagOfTiles, List<AnimalToken> bagOfTokenAnimals)
      Fills the shelf with pairs of tiles and animal tokens. - Null tiles in the shelf are replaced with random tiles from the bag. - Null tokens in the shelf are replaced with random animal tokens from the bag. - Additional pairs of tiles and tokens are added until the shelf contains 4 pairs. - If all tokens on the shelf are of the same type, they are replaced to ensure variety.
      Parameters:
      bagOfTiles - The list of available tiles. Cannot be null.
      bagOfTokenAnimals - The list of available animal tokens. Cannot be null.

    • removeLastToken

      public void removeLastToken()
      Removes the last non-null token from the right and shifts the remaining tokens to maintain order, filling the first positions with null values.

    • removeLastTile

      public void removeLastTile()
      Removes the last non-null tile from the right and shifts the remaining tile to maintain order, filling the first positions with null values.

    • sameAnimalTokens

      public int sameAnimalTokens()
      Checks if there are 3 or 4 identical animal tokens in the shelf.
      Returns:
      The frequency of identical tokens (3 or 4), oe else -1 .

    • add

      Parameters:

      token - The animal token to add (cannot be null).

    • replaceThreeTokens

      public boolean replaceThreeTokens(List<AnimalToken> bagOfTokens, boolean replace)
      Replaces 3 identical tokens.
      Parameters:
      bagOfTokens - Bag of available tokens.
      replace - a player's decision
      Returns:
      True if the tokens were replaced, otherwise False.

    • hasNoTken

      public boolean hasNoTken()
      Checks if the shelf contains no tokens.
      Returns:
